mutants.code:
def calculate_min_steps(N, W):
    min_ = 0
    max_ = W[0]
    count = 0
    for i in range(1, N):
        minv = -(i + 1)
        maxv = W[i] - (i + 1)
        count += min(max_, minv) - min(min_, minv)
        count += max(max_, maxv) - max(min_, maxv)
        min_ = minv
        max_ = maxv
    count -= max_ - min_
    return count

        count += max(max_, maxv) - max(min_, maxv)
        min_ = minv
        max_ = maxv
    count += max_ - min_
    return count
